flawed_nl_solution:
Dimes are worth $0.10 and Barry has $10 worth of dimes so he has 10/0.1 = <<10/0.1=100>>100 dimes
Dan has half the amount of dimes as Barry so Dan has 100/2 = <<100/2=50>>50 dimes
Dan finds 2 more dimes on his way home so he now has 50+2 = <<50+2=56>>56 dimes
#### 56

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 52, not 56. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
